title: Bar's volume filter
content:
The Bar's Volume Filter indicator is a tool for filtering the volume of candles on the chart. It allows users to define criteria for showing or hiding candles based on volume and time.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Settings

NameDescription
Type Determines which volume type to use.

Options:
  • Volume
  • Ticks
  • Delta
  • Bids
  • Ask
Minimum Minimum Filter Value
Maximum Maximum Filter Value
Color Sets the color for candles that match the filter criteria.

Time Filter

NameDescription
Enabled This setting enables the application of a time-based filter for the indicator. When activated, the indicator will only analyze and display data for candles that fall within a specified time range. If turned off, the indicator considers candles from all time frames.
Start time Defines the starting time for the time filter.
End time Specifies the end time for the time filter.
